amendment.description: Amendment sought to restore the $20.5 billion cuts in SNAP by offsetting the Farm Risk Management Election Program and the Supplemental Coverage Option.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to restore the $20.5 billion cuts in SNAP by offsetting the Farm Risk Management Election Program and the Supplemental Coverage Option.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 234 (Roll no. 256).
